import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import axiosInstance from "../axiosApi"; import { ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Dropdown, Popover, DropdownMenu, PopoverBody, DropdownToggle, DropdownItem } from 'reactstrap' const TodoDashboard = () => { const [popoverOpen, togglePopover] = useState(false); const [sortResult, setSortResult] = useState("default"); const [queryResult, setQueryResult] = useState([]); const { projectid } = useParams(); const haddlePopover=()=>{ togglePopover(!popoverOpen); } const sortDropdown=(event)=>{ setSortResult(event.target.getAttribute("data-type")); } useEffect(() => { const axios = axiosInstance.get(`/project/${projectid}`); axios.then(res => { console.log(res.data[0]); setQueryResult(res.data); }).catch(({response}) => { }); }, []); return (
  • Sort By

) } export default TodoDashboard;
